channel.title: Teachings on Matthew Aldridge
channel.description: Recent content in Teachings on Matthew Aldridge

item.title: MA40042 Measure Theory and Integration
item.description: This course is MA40042 Measure Theory and Integration for the year 2016–17. Lectures take place on: Tuesdays at 1415 in 3 West 4.7, Thursdays at 1015 in 4 East 3.5. Fridays at 1715 in Chancellor’s Building 3.9. This year, the course will be split into two parts: Measure theory is the first part of the course, will be lectured by me, and will last about five weeks; Integration is the second part of the course, will be lectured by Dr Matt Roberts, and will last about six weeks.
